title: Becker, continued.
content:
Over at FontStruct I've recently completed the remaining two faces in the Becker family as used in the Becker Cascade/Traffic Pro in-car navigation units. They are: the Large typeface used on the media playback screens and the Regular typeface used on unselected menus or out of the way text.

[http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/becker\_large](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611233923/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/becker_large "http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/becker\_large")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611233923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/becker-large_4107.gif)

All my FontStructs can be seen here: [http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructors/gingerbeardman](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611233923/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructors/gingerbeardman "http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructors/gingerbeardman")
author: gingerbeardman
